name: TED Ed
description:
TED Ed is a collection of quality videos that can be used for instructional purposes. This tool lets you search for and embed TED Ed vidoes in your course material.

Any key and secret will work.

name: Nook Study Links
description: This would allow you to insert a link as an item in a module, and then when the teacher accessed that link for the first time they could choose a book or chapter in a textbook to load for students.

name: Nook Study Textbooks List
description: This would allow you to insert a link as an item in a module that the teacher can use to specify a set of require reading materials for the course.

name: McGraw Hill Tegrity
description: Supports course-level support for the Tegrity lecture capture solution. Visit the Tegrity web site for instructions on how to sign up and get a consumer key and shared secret.

name: Public Collections
description:
Browse or search through multiple content repositories including MIT OCW, Softchalk Connect, Khan Academy, USA Today, etc.

Any key and secret will work.

name: Piazza
description: Piazza is a new style of discussion/Q&A site with a focus on educational institutions. This integration adds a link to the course navigation (if supported) for Piazza discussions. Contact Piazza for instructions on getting a consumer key and secret.

name: Slideshare
description:
Slideshare is a site that enables viewing and interacting with presentations without needing desktop software. Search for and embed Creative Commons-licensed presentations hosted on Slideshare.

Any key and secret will work.

name: Quizlet Flash Cards
description:
Search for and embed publicly available question sets on Quizlet. Questions can be embedded as flash cards, review, or as a study game.

Any key and secret will work.

name: CourseSmart
description: Add links to rich online textbooks, chapters, etc.

name: ChemVantage
description: Lets teachers build and distribute science education focused homework, video lectures, graded quizzes, etc. Contact admin@chemvantage.org about getting a consumer key and shared secret.

name: Noteflight
description: Build musical annotations on the web. This could be useful in music classes for both teaching and assigning to students as homework.

name: Courseload
description: Add links to rich online textbooks, chapters, etc.

name: Khan Academy
description:
Search for and embed Khan Academy lessons into course material. Khan Academy focuses on short lessons on math, science, etc.

Any key and secret will work.

name: MyOpenMath
description: Internet Math Assessment System lets you create and administer auto-graded math assessments to students. It has experimental support for passing grades back to the LMS. Visit the web site for instructions on how to sign up and get a consumer key and shared secret.

name: Graph Builder
description:
Build and embed rich interactive graphs into course content.

Any key and secret will work.

name: Wikipedia
description:
Search through English Wikipedia articles and link to or embed these articles into course material.

Any key and secret will work.

name: Campus Pack
description: Load Campus Pack inside the LMS to add ePortfolios, blogs, wikis, etc.

name: Pathbrite
description: Pathbrite is an ePortfolio tool that can be integrated into the LMS.

name: PebblePad
description: PebblePad is an ePortfolio tool that can be integrated into the LMS.

name: Wikispaces
description: Wikispaces offers free wikis for educational purposes. Private label sites can be configured to use LTI for authentication.
config_directions: Visit the Wikispages LTI configuration page for directions on configuring your Wikispaces private label site.

name: MediaSite
description: MediaSite is a webcasting and lecture capture solution that can be integrated into the LMS.

name: Aleks
description: Aleks is a site that offers customized assessment and learning resources that can be integrated into the LMS.

name: PlaceKitten
description:
PlaceKitten lets you embed perfectly-size kitten images into any online content. You pick the dimensions, whether it's color or grayscale, and then embed it into your content.

Any key and secret will work.

name: YouTube
description:
Search publicly available YouTube videos. A new icon will show up in your course rich editor letting you search YouTube and click to embed videos in your course material.

Any key and secret will work.

name: TitanPad
description: TitanPad offers free, public collaborative documents based on EtherPad. Every placement of a TitanPad in your content will result in a new pad being created. Students can also chat while working together on a pad.
